channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: What Is a ‘Circuit Breaker’ and Why Do Exchanges Need Them?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Michael Kapilkov
item.description: Should crypto exchanges follow the lead of traditional exchanges and use circuit breakers to curb panic selling?

item.title: When Will Bitcoin Join the DeFi Revolution?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ruaridh O’Donnell
item.description: The DeFi industry is decentralized by its original nature, yet Bitcoin has reportedly been claimed to have implemented centralized features. It’s time to start from the original idea again

item.title: Better Business Bureau: Crypto Scams Are The Second Riskiest in North America
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felipe Erazo
item.description: A US-based trust-gauging company claims that cryptocurrency scams represented a sharp increase during 2019

item.title: Huobi Releases New Mobile App for Crypto Trading
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felipe Erazo
item.description: Huobi Group is introducing an app for Android and iOS to trade cryptos

item.title: Federal Reserve Injects $168B, Greater Than Entire BTC Market Cap
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: The Fed adds $168 billion into the financial system, making Bitcoin’s market cap look small

item.title: Bitcoin’s Plunge Due to Traditional Markets Falling or PlusToken Dumping?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: Experts weigh in on Bitcoin’s falling price — is it due to traditional markets falling, or alleged PlusToken scam selling?

item.title: YouTube Continues Crypto Ban
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: The YouTube crypto video bans are back as Ivan on Tech and The Moon are hit again

item.title: Payment Giant Alipay Steps Up Game to Expand Beyond Payments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ting Peng
item.description: Payment giant Alipay looks to lure 44 million merchants to expand beyond payments

item.title: Global Blockchain IoT Market to Grow at a CAGR of 91.5% by 2026
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felipe Erazo
item.description: Research suggests that the market for blockchain in Internet-of-Things applications could witness a major boost by 2026

item.title: Japan's Financial Regulator Launches Global Blockchain Governance Initiate
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.description: The Blockchain Governance Initiate seeks to provide an open platform for dialogue between regulators and cryptocurrency stakeholders in Japan

item.title: Unibright to Pilot Blockchain-Based Renewable Energy Trading in Germany
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.description: Unibright will provide its technology to Wasserkraft Mittelrhein in the roll-out of its “power-buoy” project

item.title: Ivan on Tech Clashes With Richard Heart in Latest Cointelegraph Crypto Duel
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Ivan On Tech and Richard Heart face each other in Cointelegraph latest crypto duel

item.title: Bitcoin Price Below $8,000 Again — Will Bulls Buy the Dip This Time?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Horus Hughes
item.description: Bitcoin price rejected at $8,149 as global markets fell and the number of people infected with Coronavirus rose in Europe and the United States

item.title: How the Steem Saga Exposes the Dangers of Staking Pools
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Lior Yaffe
item.description: Justin Sun played by the rules of the system, maybe the problem lies within the system itself?

item.title: Brave’s BAT Rewards Can Now be Redeemed at Amazon, Apple and Netflix
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Michael Kapilkov
item.description: Brave partners with TAP Network. Now you can redeem BATs for rewards from 250,000 brands including Amazon, Apple and Netflix

item.title: Forbes Report: World’s Top 10 Billionaires Lost $38B on Black Monday
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The world’s top 10 billionaires including Facebook CEO lost a combined $38 billion on Black Monday, according to Forbes

item.title: Exclusive: A Major French Bank Is Blocking Customers From Using Coinbase
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: Initial reports suggest that French bank BNP Paribas has blocked customers from transferring funds to Coinbase

item.title: Bitcoin Options Volume Sets Record as BTC Miners Hit Breakeven Cost
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is now sitting at miner production cost as options volumes skyrocket to $200 million per day

item.title: Circle Releases USDC APIs for Crypto Mass Adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrey Shevchenko
item.description: Circle’s consolidation around USDC is finally bearing fruits as it releases APIs targeted for mass adoption

item.title: Tether Looks to Catch Up in DeFi With Aave Integration
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrey Shevchenko
item.description: Tether is moving to provide an alternative to DeFi as it joins forces with Aave

item.title: Eastern Caribbean Stock Exchange to Trial Tokenized Security Offerings
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.description: The digital asset trading platform will support BTC and ETH trading, and will be accessible to international investors

item.title: Blockchain.​Com Now Offers Crypto Lending Service to All Users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Blockchain.​com now allows retail users to borrow Paxos Standard stablecoin against Bitcoin

item.title: Hester Peirce Says SEC Is a Partner to Crypto, as US States Chase Regulations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: SEC commissioner lends an olive branch to the crypto community

item.title: Genesis Mining Rejects $3.1 Million Suit From Former Contractor
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Samuel Haig
item.description: Digital Capital claims that Genesis owes it more than $3.1 million in unpaid invoices, while Genesis is seeking to recoup all funds paid to the firm during their failed partnership

item.title: Binance Publishes Apology Letter to Steem Community and Says It Has ‘Unvoted’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Binance officially apologized to the Steem community following its involvement in a controversial hard fork initiated by Tron founder Justin Sun

item.title: Startup Vega Tests Blockchain Focused on Derivatives Trading Products
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: Vega has fired up the testnet for its new protocol made for building decentralized derivatives trading products

item.title: Crypto Lending Firm BlockFi Adds Support for Wire Transfers to Buy Crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Alexandre
item.description: BlockFi’s users can now send wire transfers to purchase digital currencies like Bitcoin, Ether and USD Coin

item.title: Indonesia’s Commodities Regulator Approves Asia-Pacific Crypto Exchange
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Crypto exchange provider Zipmex has become one of the first platforms to seal regulatory approval in Indonesia

item.title: Tezos Has Renewed Hope in 2020, but the Comeback Kid Is Still Untested
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Liam Bussell
item.description: Tezos performs better than most of the crypto market in 2020, but does it justify the hype?

item.title: Bitcoin Price Reclaims $8K After Filling Final Lower CME Futures Gap
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin just filled the only lower-lying futures gap left in the market — the sole remaining one is at $11,800
